title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 hit new lows from $180, Beats Studio Buds, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are headlined by new all-time lows on Samsung Galaxy Tab A8 models from $180. That’s on top of a chance to score Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 starting at $212 and all three colors of Beats Studio Buds at $120. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…
